name: Dog Car Seat Cover for Back Seat with Hard Bottom,Waterproof Back Seat Extender for Dogs,Dog Hammock Dogs Bed for Cars, SUVs,Pet Seat Cover for Back Seat Holds 400lbs with Mesh Window & Pocket
short_description: 【Extra Space, Strong Support】This hard bottom car seat cover for dogs enables complete coverage of the backseat area and features a reinforced load-bearing support board that holds up to 400 lbs, preventing sagging and allowing your dog to walk around or stretch their limbs easily. It solves the space shortage in most standard backseats—ideal for larger breeds or multi-dog families.

【Safe & Non-Slip】Our back seat pet cover can cover the whole back and surround, both front and back seats, bottom, and sides of both doors, which helps you solve the problem that dog is easy to fall from the back seat when the dog is mischievous active or emergency brake. Bottom non-slip dot rubber makes dog cover more secure, preventing your dog from sliding around the back seat.

【100% Waterproof, Easy Cleaning&Anti-Scratching】No need to worry about your dog's hair, slobber and claws any more. This dog seat cover features durable 600D Oxford fabric and waterproof layer, which keeps your backseat tidier and resist tears, scratches, and stains. Easy to wipe clean or machine wash—it's the ultimate low-maintenance solution for dog parents who love to explore.

【Breathable Window & Storage Pockets】Dog back seat extender has a encrypted and wider webbing mesh window for more breath ability, allowing your interact with your dog and reduce its anxiety. And this dog back seat extender also comes with three large storage pockets for your dog's toys and treats. Take your dogs on a happy trip!

【Quick & Secure Installation】Set up in seconds with adjustable straps and a universal fit for most cars, SUVs. No tools required! Folds easily when not in use, making it a travel-friendly must-have for pet owners who love road trips, vet visits, or weekend getaways. This dog seat cover ensures durability, convenience, and protection for both your car and your pup!

【2-Year Warranty & Great Service】We provide online 24/7 service as well as a 2 - year warranty. If you're not satisfied or have any advice, please don't hesitate contact us and we'll fix it to your satisfaction. Thanks!

name: Ruff Liners Medium Dog Seat Cover, Black – As Seen on Shark Tank – Back Seat Protector for Cars, Mid-Size SUVs, & Mid-Size Trucks – Waterproof, Touch Fasteners, & Belt Slots – Sturdy Dog Hammock
short_description: SPACIOUS COMFORT – Enjoy roomy travel with our premium back seat pet cover for dogs (52.4” long, 21.7” wide, and 19.7” high). Built for mid-size vehicles (Cars, SUVs, & Small Trucks), its heavy-duty waterproof fabric and center console mesh ensure a stable, cozy ride for your pet. Plus, this version features a new, expansive storage pouch on the back of the driver’s seat for maximum storage.

COMPATIBLE WITH THE FOLLOWING VEHICLES: Compatible with Audi A1. Cadillac XT6 (2023). Chevrolet Equinox and Impala 2009. Chrysler 200. Dodge Charger. Ford Escape. Honda Accord, Civic, CR-V, Pilot, and Ridgeline. Hyundai Elantra, Santa Fe, and Tuscon. Jaguar Pace Sport. Jeep Cherokee, Gladiator. Grand Cherokee, and Wrangler. Maserati Levante 2019. Mazda 3, and CX-5. Nissan Frontier, and Rogue. Subaru Forester, and Outback. Tesla Model Y, Model 3, and Model S. Toyota 4Runner, Camry, Corolla, Highlander, Rav4, Tacoma, and Grand Highlander.

NOT FOR OTHER MODELS - Medium is suited only for cars, mid-size SUV, and mid-size trucks only. If your vehicle isn’t listed above, this Medium Seat Extender will not fit. For full-size trucks and full-size SUV select the large size to ensure the proper fit. Will not work with captain's chairs or rear-hinged, backward-opening truck doors. Does not work in 3rd row.

HAMMOCK COVER FOR CARS, SUV, & SMALL TRUCKS – The Medium Seat Cover is a quilted, waterproof wrap that shields the entire back seat itself. Drape this backseat cover over your car, mid-size SUV, or mid-size truck’s back seat, secure the anchor straps, fasten each headrest strap, and attach the door panel protection using the plastic window inserts secured with hook-and-loop fasteners. In under a minute you have a snug, non-slip cover that keeps pups comfortable and upholstery free of fur, mud, and claw marks.

COMPLETE INTERIOR COVERAGE – The Ruff Liners pet seat cover combines patented door protection (US Patent #12,221,024) with reinforced zippers, hook-and-loop fasteners window inserts, and bolstered edges to guard against scratches, drool, and debris in mid-size vehicles.

EASY CLEAN & WATERPROOF – Stay adventure-ready with an industry-standard back seat cover for dogs, engineered to resist mud, fur, and spills. Great for adventures or daily errands—just wipe it down or machine-washable on gentle and hang dry to keep your back seat fresh and spotless. Comes with a heavy-duty waterproof travel bag for tidy, grab-and-go storage.

EASY INSTALL & SECURE DESIGN – Transport your pet safely with these dog seat covers with built-in anchors, adjustable seat belt zippers that work with child seat anchors (LATCH), a non-slip underside, and a giant zippable mesh that allows for maximum airflow. The secure design keeps pets steady in transit while you focus on the drive.
